item.title: A Trump Inaugural Speech for a Trump Presidency
item.description: The address was another sign that the newly sworn-in president intends to govern the way he ran.

item.title: Trump Puts His Presidency on Warp Speed
item.description: His agenda-item-filled second inaugural address set a tone that could serve his administration well.

item.title: Donald Trump’s Presidential Inauguration: Live Updates
item.description: Follow along for live updates and analysis from the NR team on the second inauguration of Donald Trump.

item.title: Sworn to defend, &c.
item.description: On Secretary Austin’s farewell speech; Jean-Marie Le Pen; Congressman Mike Turner; Marigold Johnson; and more.

item.title: The Republican Trifecta Should Focus on Pro-Family Policy
item.description: Raise the child tax credit and introduce a ‘baby bonus’ for parents of newborns.
